name: Russ
text:
Russ
Russ was a resident of Twin Peaks, Washington and Carrie's partner.
While Russ, Carrie, and Ralph were driving past the Double R Diner, Ralph took out a handgun from a box that Carrie had unwittingly stashed in back and fired out of the car, through the window of the Double R Diner. They stopped their car in the road, causing a traffic jam, and Carrie screamed at Russ for not telling her about the gun. Deputy Bobby Briggs' approached and directed Jesse Holcomb to get the couple's identification.
